column1: 89870349$Masked HERO Blast$Unlimited$WIND$[Warrior/Fusion/Effect]$$$$$6$2200$1800$$$$Must be Special Summoned with "Mask Change". If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its ATK becomes half its current ATK. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can pay 500 LP
column2: then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; return it to the hand.$Mask Change$$Returns from field to hand$Summon/Trigger/Quick$
